description: Provide repairs and maintenance services for electrical equipment and systems on an as and when requested basis by Department of National Defence (DND) in the form of call-ups.
tags: Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Competitive, Low Price, Canadian, Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), Bid Only, Discovery on July 6th 2023, August 31st 2028, Worker, Supervisor, Equipment, Material, Transportation, Electrical system services
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Electrical Services for the Department of National Defence (DND)

### Notice Information

* **Tender ID**: W689C-230019
* **Reference Number**: WS4076878064-Doc4077356964
* **Publication Date**: July 6, 2023
* **Amendment Date**: July 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 26, 2023 02:00 PM EDT

### Contract Information

* **Contract Period**: Expected to commence on an unspecified date and end on August 31, 2028
* **Expected Contract Value**: Not specified
* **Contract Type**: Standing Offer
* **Procurement Category**: Construction and Infrastructure Services (CNST)

### Procurement Method

* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity

* **Regions of Opportunity**: None specified

### Regions of Delivery

* **Regions of Delivery**: Alberta

### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

### End User Entity Information

* **End User Entity Name**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **End User Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Christopher Lau
* **Contact Email**: christopher.lau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Description

The Standing Offer is for the provision of electrical services to the Department of National Defence (DND) on an "as and when" requested basis. The services to be provided include:

* Labour
* Equipment
* Tools
* Materials
* Supervision
* Transportation

The work will be undertaken to repair and maintain electrical equipment and systems, as required by DND.

To submit a bid, please refer to the [official tender notice](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16793779?extsite=MTY3OTM3NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
